Instruction: Heat your oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Mix white sugar, brown sugar, flour, and salt in a medium mixing bowl. Slowly stir in boiling water until the mixture is smooth. Add cream, nutmeg, and vanilla. Pour the mixture into the pastry shell.
Bake in a preheated oven for 20 minutes. Then reduce the heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake for another 20 minutes.
